cu.explanation_en: Setting the integrity algorithm to the unknown enum 'nia9' will cause negotiation failure during the security negotiation phase and NAS registration rejection.

du.explanation_en: Setting the global log level to an invalid enum 'invalid_level' will cause a configuration parsing error during startup, preventing the DU from initializing properly.
du.explanation_zh: 將全域日誌等級設定為無效枚舉值 'invalid_level' 會在啟動期間導致配置解析錯誤，阻止 DU 正確初始化。
